meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Downer Rebecca Heide Catherine Ono Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7782.

td.p: Jason Downer, a real estate agent from Anthem, Arizona
Rebecca Heide, an economist from Washington, D.C.
Catherine Ono, a software developer from Santa Clara, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $23,201)

tr.td: TITLE PEOPLE: HOW NOVEL!
I NEED A DRINK
MEDICAL WORDS & PHRASES
THE KISS CAM
HQ TRIVIA
THE "IRS"
